title: Program Overviews
description: Stay on top of your progress. Quickly know how your projects are measuring up against your targets with a simplified dashboard designed to tell you the essentials without complicating things. Filter by contributing projects, country / region and reporting periods for a more detailed view when your reporting needs require you to zoom in a bit more.

title: Program Hierarchies
description: Get a comprehensive overview of your programme by working with a single, core results framework and building out a project hierarchy that shares that results framework. Ensure the entire implementing team is working the same indicators: titles, descriptions, and disaggregation categories. Maintain the consistency and integrity of your results framework regardless of how many projects your programme has.

title: Template Reports
description: Take full advantage of having all of your results data in a single platform by working with RSR template reports that seamlessly pulls together all of your results into standard reporting formats: Excel, Word and PDF. Use our template reports to help meet your internal or your donor reporting requirements.
